scenario.name: Basic Sipstone UAC
scenario.send: INVITE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] X-Plcm-Require: sdp-rtp sdp-audio sdp-video-main sdp-fecc CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: sip:sipp@127.0.0.1:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0

ACK sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 ACK Contact: sip:sipp@127.0.0.1:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
